title: Aaron Carter Rocks 6-Pack And New Face Tattoo Amid Concerns On Mental State
text:
Aaron Carter made a permanent change to his face after blowing up his brother Nick Carter's life with sexual assault allegations.

The "Sooner or Later" singer showed off his new face tattoo on Friday.

Related:

Aaron Carter Accuses His Brother Nick Of Sexually Assaulting A 91-Year-Old Woman, Calls On FBI To Help

Aaron Carter Says He Was Sexually Abused by Late Sister & Accuses Nick of Family Abuse

Nick Carter Says Brother Aaron Hears 'Voices In His Head'

Nick Carter Serves Brother Aaron With Restraining Order After Violent Threats

Aaron Carter Appears Thin & Sickly After Cancelling Tour Dates

Showcasing his impressive 6-pack, Aaron posed shirtless and took a selfie revealing his new look.

"I'M THE BIGGEST THING IN MUSIC RIGHT NOW. I CANT BE DENIED. FACT CHECK ME," he wrote.

Aaron also gave fans a glimpse of what looks like Medusa on his face in another selfie.

You'll recall, Medusa was labeled a "monster" in Greek mythology and everyone who looked at her face turned to stone.

It's an interesting move for the 31-year-old considering fans are worried for the singer's mental state after he publicly accused his older brother of abuse and sexual assault.

The backstreet Boy later got a restraining order on Aaron claiming his brother hears "voices in his head."

Aaron also allegedly threatened to kill Nick's pregnant wife.
